title: Possible link between rotavirus vaccine and decline in type 1 diabetes

title_detail.value: Possible link between rotavirus vaccine and decline in type 1 diabetes

summary: A drop in the number of young children diagnosed with type 1 diabetes could be associated with the introduction of routine rotavirus vaccination of Australian infants, according to a new study.

summary_detail.value: A drop in the number of young children diagnosed with type 1 diabetes could be associated with the introduction of routine rotavirus vaccination of Australian infants, according to a new study.
